STU_UUID = #{stuUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update STU_MSG set STU_UUID = #{stuUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMSG_TITLE = #{smsgTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMSG_CONTEXT = #{smsgContext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMSG_IDENTITY = #{smsgIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMSG_DATE = #{smsgDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SMSG_STATUS = #{smsgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMSG_TYPE = #{smsgType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SMSG_GROUP = #{smsgGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SMSG_UUID = #{smsgUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update STU_MSG set SMSG_STATUS = #{smsgStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SMSG_UUID = #{smsgUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(*) from STU_MSG where STU_UUID = #{stuUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SMSG_STATUS = #{smsgStatus}
